title: Apartment Maintenance Notice
passages: Document 1: Notice to Residents of 'Greenwood Towers'. Please be advised that the main water supply will be shut off for essential maintenance on Thursday, August 12, from 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM. This affects all units in Building A. We apologize for the inconvenience.

Document 2: Email from James Miller (Unit 402A). Date: August 10. To: Property Management. I saw the notice about the water shut-off. I work from home and have several video calls scheduled this Thursday. Is there any way to access the community lounge in Building B during those hours? I need a quiet space with reliable internet and, ideally, access to a restroom.

Document 3: Reply from Management (August 11). Dear Mr. Miller, residents of Building A are welcome to use the Building B lounge during the maintenance period. Your key card will be updated to grant you access temporarily. Please note that the lounge's Wi-Fi password is 'Greenwood2026'.

questions.q: How long will the water be unavailable?
questions.explanation: 10:00 AMから2:00 PM（14:00）までなので、4時間です。

questions.q: Why does Mr. Miller need the lounge?
options: He wants to use the gym.
He needs to participate in online meetings.
He is moving to Building B.
questions.explanation: 文書2でI have several video calls scheduled（ビデオ会議がいくつか予定されている）と述べています。

questions.q: What will the management do for Mr. Miller?
options: Enable his card for another building
questions.explanation: 文書3でYour key card will be updated to grant you access（鍵カードを更新してアクセス権を付与する）とあります。
